description: This is a farming simulation game where you can farm, mine, fish, and become friends with three cats. However, at the same time, you also face a huge and constantly growing debt. You need to continue operating your farm to earn income until you can repay the debt

name: Descending The Woods
description: By day, tend to your farm, care for your pets, and explore the mysteries of the haunted woods. By nightfall, They will come from the woods, Beware of ghosts and demons of the haunted woods. Hide, Survive, Build, Fight and Explore in this eerie Survival Horror alone or with friends.

name: Merchant Isle
description: Ship wrecked on an island, establish your merchant empire from the ground up. Buy and sell items, negotiate prices, invest in businesses, and establish trade routes. Explore ancient ruins for high worth relics. Claw your way up to the top of the merchant guild!

name: The Renovator: Origins
description: We play as the son of a restorer, a museum worker who died tragically. While searching for the memorabilia, the door suddenly closes and strange things begin to happen. The hero is waiting for immersion in the world of art and the paranormal.

description: Navigate through Silicon Sneak, where time is of the essence to save your sister. Choose to be an Ethical Hacker or one among those who hide from the police. With various minigames to challenge your dexterity, evolve with upgrades and make decisions to discover multiple endings.

name: Tiny Dino: Royale
description: Can you avoid extinction in Tiny Dino: Royale? A new genre bending clicker game where you compete with players to see who can survive the longest. Collect unique dino skins that can be used to craft rare rewards, climb the leaderboards, and find out how many ways you can destroy asteroids.

name: Crazy Corn
description: Crazy Corn is an addictive clicker game where your clicking skills can lead you to unimaginable riches! Improve your level, automate your income and unlock new items.

name: The Hamster
description: Welcome to "The Hamster" – a fun and relaxing clicker game where you collect unique skins for your adorable hamster. Earn points, unlock new skins, and enjoy the simple yet captivating gameplay. Perfect for those looking for a light and enjoyable gaming experience.

Play for story (progress saves), or endlessly & conquer the leaderboard. You ever felt endlessly stuck? So has the Itsy Bitsy Spider. Together, can you both help him out of it?

name: Osterity
description:
Burdensome regulations have long stymied the United Aerospace Corporation's ability to innovate in the energy sector. However, recent pro-business rulings represent a welcome change of pace, clearing the way for us to open an exciting new facility in the Lone Star State. Come on down 'n' see us sometime, y'all!

OSTERITY is a 7+1 map vanilla "mega episode" for the Doom 2 IWAD, powered by OTEX. A 3-episode, Doom 1-inspired megawad squeezed into just 7 maps. The basic formula is to alternate sprawling megamaps with short boss/challenge maps, though the rules are bent a little towards the end.

name: Cluminati
description: Test your linguistic skills in Cluminati, a puzzle word game where you decipher clues to unlock passwords and join a secret society. Use your wits while racing against time to advance through 13 challenging rounds of initiation.

name: Tube Noodles
description:
Last night you tried this new "tube noodles" stuff for dinner. It tasted just... ok.

Now, why is your stomach speaking to you? And why does it keep telling you to EAT?

name: SiMarket: Supermarket Simulator
description: Manage your supermarket in siMarket! Purchase products, stock shelves, serve customers, hire staff, and expand your store. Can you turn your small shop into a retail empire?

name: Kevurah Horror Tale
description: In Kevurah, you drive through a forest where you must reach a funeral that you must organize, bringing the various objects you have in your car into the funeral. All this while something torments and pressures you about the funeral.

name: Eternal Escape: Castle of Shadows
description: This is a light puzzle game set in a vampire manor, inspired by the experience of playing the "Castlevania series" and combined with an understanding and reflection on vampire culture.

name: Short Adventure
description: An RPG that uses the ATB battle system seen in early Final Fantasy games, Short Adventure follows a diseased young woman who goes from every day college student to criminal to outcast as she tries to cope with her life changing quickly.

name: Infinite Inside
description:
Explore a serene and mysterious world, collect shards, solve intricate puzzles, and assemble keys to unlock the mysteries of a secret society.

Escape into five enchanting labyrinths, each filled with secrets hidden in every corner that are key to unlocking the mystery hidden within the 'Plinth'. Designed to fully utilise new mixed reality headsets to deliver an immersive VR and MR (Mixed Reality) gameplay.

Use intuitive hand tracking to manipulate 3D geometric puzzles, build keys, and interact with the game world.

name: The Overseer
description: You are an Overseer on duty. Cycle through the camera feeds looking for anomalies. Upon finding one, report it quickly. Too many anomalies can lead to severe distortions in reality and result in deaths, including yours.

name: Sleep Stream
description: Sleep Stream is a roguelite survivor game that exquisitely combines the fun factors of roguelite with the tension of survival. Host a bloody livestreaming to fall asleep with synergy combinations and equipment enhancements to match Layla's various personas.

name: Ballz
description: Relax your brain with the ultimate time killer!

name: S-Project 66
description: Survive this nightmare by hiding in your surroundings. Be discreet, because death will be final.

name: Solitar: Retro Picks
description: Solitar Retro Picks is a collection of relaxing and challenging solitaire games, perfect to play while listening to an audio book or while binge watching your latest favorite TV series.

name: She Could Fly: Documentary Escape Game
description: Online gamer Tiger Orchid has picked up the new title 'She Could Fly: Documentary Escape Game'. You play with Tiger entering an empty flat covered in comic book art. Who lives here? What's up with the creepy knitted birds? How do you get out? Will someone fix the toaster?

name: Hentai Puzzle: Girls
description: Hentai Puzzle: Girls is a fun puzzle game that tests your intelligence and attention! Create wonderful images by correctly combining jigsaw puzzles in this game featuring colorful and attractive anime girls.

name: System Malfunction
description: "System Malfunction" is a first-person horror game set in a mysterious building. The player takes on the role of a security guard who witnesses strange occurrences during the night shift. In a fear-inducing environment, the player explores the building to uncover hidden truths.

name: The Breakup Arena
description: A Beat 'Em Up game where you confront your ex-lovers, blending intense action with deep emotional storytelling. Explore the complexities of relationships and discover inner peace through unique gameplay.

name: Within: Hannah's Journey
description: In this turn-based JRPG, discover Hannah's strange journey into the confines of her nightmares and memories. Taking part in a mysterious place where all her regrets, mourning and mistakes reside.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Red Things
description: Puzzles of Red Things!

name: Magic Venue
description: Defeat waves of enemies drawn to your powers! Grow stronger and travel between worlds and dimensions! Magic Venue is an action roguelike game where you battle enemies, build your skill deck, devise strategies, get defeated, but always come back stronger!

name: Man I Just Wanna Go Home
description: Man I Just Wanna Go Home is an "MSPaint-noir" visual novel with 13 endings, a unique visual style and a killer 80s inspired soundtrack. The story revolves around a delivery person stranded in an unfamiliar part of the city under the devastating rain. All he wants is to get home. Help him!

name: Hybrid Miniature Golf Beta
description: Experience the ultimate fusion of classic miniature golf and adrenaline-pumping action in Hybrid Mini Golf! Master parkour challenges, race against time, and craft custom courses with the intuitive map maker. Get ready to swing into a world of competitive fun!

name: The Nameless City
description: The Nameless City is a narrative-driven first person adventure inspired by Lovecraft's short novel of the same name. It has lo-fi 3D graphics inspired by the PSX era and uses AI generated images to convey concepts alien to the human mind.

name: Catch the Vandal
description: Catch the Vandal is an multiplayer game where players take on the roles of both police officers and vandals. Police officers must identify the vandals among the citizens, while the vandals try to disguise themselves and vandalize the city. Have fun competing to achieve objectives and win the game.

name: Only Up: Skibidi Together
description: Only Up: Skibidi Together is an intense online parkour game of precision and speed. Jump and climb over various obstacles, each with unique challenges and surprises. The slightest mistake can result in a fall to the starting line.

name: Cosmic Mirage
description: Welcome to the exciting universe of Cosmic Mirage, where incredible space battles await you. Free the captured planets from the dark forces of the galactic conquerors.

name: Mana Cycle
description: Mana Cycle is a fast-paced puzzle party game with a unique twist on falling block mechanics, featuring strategic cycle-based piece-clearing. Compete with friends locally or online in thrilling multiplayer matches!

name: The Old Gentleman
description: Use Morse Code to communicate with your crewmate and ward off a stalking monster in this short point-and-click horror game.

name: Miniatures
description: Miniatures is a cozy puzzle game where you start a journey in the world of a bookworm girl. In this journey, you're tasked with solving puzzles of miniature-style illustrations to create cities by fitting blocks, making paths by aligning roads & rivers and reanimating landmarks by matching pieces.

name: FaceYourFear
description: Face your fear is a horror game based on a story with puzzles and a realistic and stressful atmosphere.

name: Hello World
description: You have strayed into the world of computer! ? During the exploration, you will have a series of interesting interactions with folders, garbage files, Word documents, PowerPoint documents, Excel documents, anti-virus software, blinking cursors while typing and even binary 0 and 1 in computer!

name: Chronocide
description: Stop the undead from entering the temporal portals with traps and your weapons. Play the campaign solo or in co-op mode up to 4 players.

name: Sexy Apocalypse Girls
description: Sexy Apocalypse Girls is an adult visual novel set in a destroyed and dangerous world after a sudden outbreak of the virus.

name: Baimason's Thing Finder Puzzle
description: This is a small and relaxing game in which you have to find objects made with pixels, within levels made with those same objects! Each level is unique, adorable and procedural, allowing you to play your favorite levels infinitely.

name: Governor of the West
description: Governor of the West is a turn-based game of exploration, resource management, and outlaw placement set in the Old West. Choose a starting character, explore the West, recruit your gang, build up your town, and maybe -- if you play your cards right -- become the Governor!

name: Code Name Teacher
description: As an undercover cop, you'll infiltrate a criminal organization to bring it down. As a teacher, your mission is to stop the gang in school and the neighborhood! Your choices shape the story, relationships, and outcomes. The decisions are yours.

name: Space Drop
description:
Leap from spaceships into warp tunnels moving at extreme speeds in this exhilarating VR experience. Evade obstacles, maneuver through space gates, collect pickups, and challenge yourself to become the best “Space Jumper” in the universe.

Compete for Galactic Glory

name: Factory Islands
description: Organize the blocks on this island correctly to complete the factory and ensure that the ores reach their destination. Relax as you use your logic to create a functional path using conveyors, tunnels, splitters, presses and furnaces.

name: Starters Orders Touch Horse Racing
description: Starters Orders Touch now on desktop from ! A brand new GUI and improved game play and the most advanced simulation engine to date cement Starters Orders as the No.1. horse racing management series. Available here on Steam once out of beta.

name: Otokonoko Fishing
description: Become a boy and go fishing in a city with rivers all around you! Cross-dressing Fishing is an action game-like fishing simulation! Your ultimate goal is to find your missing brother in the distant sea. Equip yourself for this with "Fishing and Cross-dressing"!

name: Forward Brave
description: 《Forward Brave》has no turning back. Choose your hero, explore the program-generated card dungeon, collect resources, kill enemies, combine and match active skills with various special-effect artifacts, make rational use of various props and buffs, move to the next floor, and finally win the victory!

name: The Dragonhood
description: The Dragonhood is a clicker RPG with rougelite elements and automatic battles. Collect eggs, hatch dragons, and loot stuff on a variety of 1 vs 1 adventures or 3 vs 3 dungeons. Complete quests and build your dragons the way you want with various evolutions, abilities, amulets, and more!

name: Spotless
description: Clean, Clash, and Collect across the crummiest corners of this Single-Player Rogue-Lite. Spend your meager earnings wisely on both permanent and temporary upgrades, so that even the thriving haunts of cute and creepy creatures can’t stop you from cleaning until everything is Spotless!

name: Deathwatchers
description: Deathwatchers is a 4 player online co-op 'spot the difference' style, psychological horror. Use the equipment at your disposal to locate & log as many events as possible. Build your ritual and try to cleanse the locations of any demonic threats. An incorrect ritual and you may never leave.

name: Benefitship
description: Experience the rapidly increasing sexual tension in the blossoming "friendship" between a futanari and her new roommate. A short and fun friends-with-benefits visual novel.

name: Knightess
description: Anastasia, Artemisia & Lozen, three mercenaries who roam the Kingdom' looking for work, are seen by the King as the possible solution to keep the peace, even if only temporally. Join the three of them, as they journey in what will become a path of discovery, friendship and betrayal.

name: Counterpick Labs
description: Counterpick Labs is a cute, free-to-play platform fighter where players customize their character with quirky weapons and gadgets.

name: Time Circuit
description: Deep integration of city builder and tower defense. Time is the most crucial resource in this world. Lead your clan to construct a base in the dazzling circuit world and fend off waves of enemy attacks!

name: Back to Home
description: Back To Home is a short adventure where you explore a beautiful world and solve puzzles Throughoutthe journey, you will uncover an interesting story about the past of the main character.

name: Moen
description: Climb the mountain while you make friends. A multiplayer 3D platformer playground where you do whatever you feel like. You can climb the mountain, do activities around the Island or just chill out and meet new friends.

name: Cursed Bet
description: Cursed Bet is a horror game where you play from a body camera perspective. Tackle a cursed doll as you delve into the creepy story of the abandoned preschool you entered to record a videos for a bet.

name: Quintus and the Formidable Curse
description: ‘Quintus and the Formidable Curse’ is a Horror-Adventure game with a difference; the protagonists are a Man and Mouse duo!

name: Project Unknown
description: PROJECT UNKNOWN is a 1-4 online co-op horror game with unique playable characters and special abilities. Exorcise different ghosts, utilize a variety of tools, and immerse yourself in an experience full of horrifying visuals and complex mechanics.

name: Hogvalord: The Ranch
description: Play as a fresh graduated hogmaster and manage your own ranch in a remote and desolated land. Collect different types of hogragon egg, raise them up, let everyone in the kingdom know how adorable these mythical beings are. Build houses and workshops, design this ranch to your heart's content!

name: Centauri's Favourite Archer
description: Ten years after the events of the Albino Hunter, Aline Andrews lives a quiet life in Centauri along with her brother's family. But, when her brother's pregnant wife gets sick with an unknown illness, Aline must journey outside her comfort zone and face the perils of rest of the world...

name: The Last Alchemist
description: The Last Alchemist is a third-person alchemy simulation game about the blazing pursuit of science and friendship.

name: Al Qmrah Restaurant
description: Survive the night in AL QMRAH RESTAURANT with a 4-Player co-op survival horror set in a real-life restaurant, players take on the roles of restaurant workers completing closing tasks while facing haunted kitchen creatures and keeping the restaurant stable to find there way out.

name: Home Survival
description: Home Survival is an open-world game that is a unique combination of first and third person shooter, survival, crafting, and role-playing games. Experience your own path. Whether it's building the home of your dreams, tending to your crops and watching the sun go down.

name: Zombie Raid: No One Survives
description: Zombie Raid is a PvP top-down shooter, with realistic looking tactical battles. Raid infected city, fight for survival in team battles.

name: All Men Are Pigs
description:
A queer and raunchy adult comedy with a tropical flavor. As the main character, you get to move to a Caribbean island named Santa Locura, working the summer away in a bar named The Inqueersition.

Your day to day routine gets derailed by the men you meet, all of them hiding a dealbreaker in their closet. What IS their deal? WHY is it so hard to find a proper man? Do you even NEED a man?

...well, this is a dating sim, so we’ll go with “yes”.

You will get to interact with your friends, coworkers and possible love interests in a variety of ways. Will you manage to land the man of your dreams and love him despite the issues they might have, or will they chew you up and spit you like gum?

name: Wastelander
description: Wastelander is a minimalist turn-based colony building game with roguelike and deckbuilding elements, where you start from nothing as a castaway on an alien world, build your colony, collect resources and protect yourself from mysterious and destructive atmospheric storms while using the secrets of the alien ruins to find a way to escape. As your colony expands you'll find alien artifacts and buildings, perks, technology upgrades, and consumable items scattered across the map.

name: Battal Gazi: Stone of Yada
description: The Stone of Yada which gives enormous power to its possessors has broken into four pieces. Kill every enemy in front of you, capture Yada Guards, and bring these pieces together one by one to obtain that power.

name: Kaku: Ancient Seal
description: "An Open world Action adventure combining exploration with puzzles and dynamic combat. Go on a journey across a sprawling continent as Kaku, a young boy tasked to restore balance to the land. Brave the four elemental regions with the help of Piggy, his powerful companion and conquer their lords. "

name: World War Z: Desert Defenders Weapons Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: MouseVentures
description: A puzzle game where you control Pipo, a stuffed mouse. He will enter two storybooks to help the characters inside while use magnetism and light to solve the puzzles that stand in their way.

name: DCS World: AH-64D The Four Horsemen Campaign by Fight's On Simulations
description: In 2014, the militant group Islamic State made vast territorial gains in Iraq and Syria following several offensives. It is claimed its territory was captured by a caliphate, within which it enforced a strict interpretation of Sharia. The group, which was designated a terrorist organisation by the United Nations, received universal condemnation for its human rights abuses and crimes against humanity. The Iraqi government formally requested of the United States and wider international community, they begin airstrikes against ISIL in support of their fight on the ground.

name: DCS World: UH-1H Worlds Apart Stormfront Campaign by Low-Level-Heaven Mission Development
description: STORMFRONT is a story-driven campaign that follows the story of SPRING 2025. As in the first part of the WORLDS APART series, you find yourself in the role of a German Bell UH-1 helicopter pilot serving in the squadron "WOLF PACK," a German Army unit (Heeres Flieger).

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Original Aircraft Series Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Experimental Aircraft Series Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Cutting-Edge Aircraft Series Set
description: Sin descripción

name: DCS World: Flaming Cliffs 2024
description: Flaming Cliffs (FC) 2024 is the next chapter of the popular Flaming Cliffs series that features an expanded list of aircraft: The F-5E FC, F-86F FC, and MiG-15bis FC. As with all FC aircraft, these additions are easy-to-learn, with less complex controls, and includes their DCS Professional Flight Models. The more accessible FC-style concept allows new and existing players to quickly jump into the action and have fun at an exceptionally advantageous price point.

name: DCS World: MiG-15bis Flaming Cliffs
description: MiG-15bis Flaming Cliffs is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: MiG-15bis. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the plane and have fun. At the same time, the full-fidelity physics of the original model is preserved, providing the same professional-level flight characteristics and sense of flight.

name: Sweet Cards
description: Sweet Cards - is a card-matching game. Players can choose one of three decks of cards to match. Each deck of cards has a different style. As long as the player successfully matches all the cards, he can enjoy the beautiful girl's beauty in the viewing mode at any time. Tutu.

name: DCS World: F-5E Flaming Cliffs
description: F-5E Flaming Cliffs is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: F-5E Tiger II. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the F-5E and have fun. At the same time, the full-fidelity physics of the original model is preserved, providing the same professional-level flight characteristics and sense of flight.

name: DCS World: F-86F Flaming Cliffs
description: F-86F Flaming Cliffs is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: F-86F Sabre. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the plane and have fun. At the same time, the full-fidelity physics of the original model is preserved, providing the same professional-level flight characteristics and sense of flight.

name: Truck Driver Go
description: Truck Driver Go is a free-to-play driving sim mobile game where you'll take on various trucking missions, explore different locations, and follow a compelling narrative. Truck Driver Go offers the ultimate truck-driving experience inspired by the hit game Truck Driver game. Take on the role of David, who sets out to restore his father’s legacy and make a mark in trucking history. Embark on an emotional journey as you follow an intriguing narrative, while transporting different cargo across a network of roads.

name: Redd War: Turnabout
description: In a world similar to our own, a race of sociopathic humanoid creatures known simply as the REDD arrived to Earth and unleashed their homicidal tendencies. But over time, a truce was formed between the humans and REDD. A truce that is in effect on all days but one. This day is known to the entire globe as the REDD War.

name: Yuki
description:
An online discussion board. Mysterious Ghost Sightings. A closed down Campus. What happened to your friend?

No jumpscares. The only demons are the horrors that took place ten years ago to the residents of the Luxiang Campus.

Unravel what happened, reach out to the truth and confront the spirits. avoid their attacks in a fast paced bullet-hell gameplay.

name: Hamster Combat
description: Hamster Clicker is a clicker game about collecting hamsters! Every 3 and 18 hours, you get dropped a chest with hamsters!

name: Milk
description: DROP WORKING NOW Milk is a clicker type game in which you just have to click milk. Simple as that! Milks drops every 1, 3 and 5 hours. Milks also can be made by community on discord. Enjoy and expand your collection of milks!

name: Box Clicker
description: Box Clicker is a game in which you break Boxes to get more Boxes. And that's just the beginning!

name: UnderDark
description:
Tower Defense: Guarding the Flame from the Darkness!
Defend the Flame from the dark! Level up, strategically place towers, and choose buffs to grow stronger. Keep the light alive!
Defend the Eternal Flame: Experience the thrill of defending the flame from hordes of dark forces that besiege it! Feel the exhilaration as you clear stages, with each victory more satisfying than the last.
One-Handed Gameplay: Enjoy easy-to-master controls, designed for one-handed play. Perfect for strategic fun anytime, anywhere.
Customize Your Defense Strategy: Select buffs and strategically place towers to forge your path of resistance. As you level up and choose your growth buffs, your defense becomes an impenetrable fortress.
Heroic Stand: Choose your guardians to stand against the night. Each hero brings unique abilities to the battlefield. Earn trophies, level up, and enhance your heroes to ensure the flame flickers on through the darkest nights!

name: Lore Masters: Video Games
description:
Lore Masters: Video Games, the ultimate trivia challenge for gamers. Dive into a vast collection of over 30 000 questions and adding daily to test your ability to identify images from games.

In the ranked game mode, all players face the same set of 15 questions in the exact same order. This ensures a fair and consistent challenge, allowing players to truly test their knowledge and compete on an even playing field.

name: Erogods: Sunrise
description: Erogods: Sunrise - is a dating simulator with feminized Japanese gods.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Just Around the Summer All in One Pack
description: Summer is just around the corner, which means it's the perfect time to get ready with the CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Just Around the Summer ALL in ONE Pack! This pack features some short, breezy summer hairstyles and outfits to match, plus some summery dances!

name: Holiday After Special
description: Holiday After Special is a short slice-of-life, horror anthology following the Step Sisters' adventures over the holidays before the events of Halloween After Special.

name: The Exit 8 VR
description:
You are trapped in an endless underground passageway.
Observe your surroundings carefully to reach "The Exit 8".

Make sure not to overlook any anomalies.
If you find any anomalies, turn back immediately.
If you don't find any anomalies, keep going.
Kindly exit through Exit 8.

The Exit 8 VR is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese underground passageways, liminal spaces and the Backrooms.

name: Senshijidaino Kyoryu: Dinoprehis!
description: Sin descripción

name: Incredifall
description: We aim to make the most Entertaining and Exhilarating game possible! Incredifall! Also, offer CASH PRIZES in the future!! :D 60 Challenging Levels at the moment and there will be 200 levels offering hours of entertainment! Are you excited as we are to play this amazing original game? Play now!

name: Cyberpunk Samurai
description: Sin descripción

name: 2D Dogfight: Sunset and Sunrise
description: "2D Dogfight - Sunset and Sunrise" DLC includes the following 36 Aircrafts: F-80A-1 Shooting Star F-84E-10-RE Thunderjet F7F-1 Tigercat F8F-1 Bearcat F9F-4 Panther P-51H-10NA Mustang Hornet F.1 Hunter F.1 Meteor F Mk.4 Meteor F Mk.8 Sea Fury X Spiteful F Mk.16 La-9 La-11 MiG-9 MiG-15 Yak-9P

name: 8th Baspis
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Jinrou
description: Can you survive this dungeon...! A new dungeon exploration werewolf game is here! ! 20 people can play against each other and over 60 types of roles!

name: Doomsday Hunters: Boss Rush Mega Pack
description: Doomsday Hunters: Boss Rush Mega Pack is the first expansion for our beloved super roguelike shooter, offering an even more extensive array of content. Try new relics and familiars, fight endless supply of bosses in the Boss Rush mode!

name: RPG Alchemy: Spell I
description: Sin descripción

name: Mithrun Calls
description: Sin descripción

name: Busway Islands: Puzzle
description: Build efficient bus routes across beautiful islands! Solve puzzles, connect stations & pick up all passengers

name: Brawl Arena: Arcade Shooter
description: An exciting top down arena shooter with unique characters, powerful enemies, incredible bosses and a huge arsenal of weapons!

name: Eggconsole Popful Mail PC-8801MkIISR
description: Set in a world of swords and magic, the comical adventures of a bounty hunter begin. The definitive slapstick action RPG adventure is here!

name: Destroy the World Bundle
description: Farm and survive in Farm for your Life a zombie filled post-apocalyptic farming game or destroy the world yourself as Rack an alien demon in Rack N Ruin.

name: Danger Stunt Drive: Extreme Racing Simulator
description: Extreme racing on dangerous tracks on powerful sports cars - prove to everyone who is the King of the Downhill here!

name: Muv-Luv / Muv-Luv Alternative Remastered Double Pack
description: The definitive edition of the Muv-Luv saga, now available on Nintendo Switch! Both games in one pack!

name: Muv-Luv Remastered
description: One of the most highly-acclaimed visual novel series ever, now available on Nintendo Switch!

name: Muv-Luv Alternative Remastered
description: Playtime's over. Time for despair. Experience a masterpiece in the Muv-Luv saga's thrilling conclusion.

name: Headup Multiplayer Bundle
description: The Headup Multiplayer Bundle includes Super Treasure Arena, Doodle Derby and Tied Together.

name: Anomaly Pools
description: Ready to dive to liminal spaces horror?

name: Let's Aim Shooting Gallery
description:
Gear up for a carnival game classic: shooting gallery!
Hit as many targets as you can and become a shooting gallery master!

name: Sugoi Girls: Kinky Knight
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Toon Roads: Superbike
description: Choose your superbike, twist the throttle and LET'S GO, let the race begin!!!

name: Urban Warfare: Assault
description: Embark on a heart-pounding journey of combat and strategy in Urban, a third-person solo shooter that pits you against the world's most dangerous terrorists.

name: Arcade Archives: Tinkle Pit
description: "TINKLE PIT" is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1993. Your objective: Save Tinkle Land from an evil spell and restore peace to the world! Featuring characters drawn from NAMCO classics and deep gameplay for high score competition!

name: 1024 Cement Mixer
description: A short aggressive map within a 1024 player-bound volume.

name: The Immortal Lock
description:
You are Ranger, an operator of the UTJR stationed at a secret, multinational research facility in Finland. You are being deployed to investigate the disappearance of a survey team that went missing beyond the slipgate, cast into the farthest reaches of existence. Yet through the thin veil of reality, you find only a desolate plane of flesh and despair, and a dread voice that beckons your name.

This map is larger than an entire episode, if played in its entirety, and is best experienced in segments. It includes a story, extremely challenging fights, trick jumping, and a vast amount of large secret areas, but is difficulty scaled to accommodate everyone.

name: Late Night at the KWL
description:
Years ago, I worked for a radio station. The KWL.

Strange place.
It didn't run any songs, or interviews, or news. Just stories. Any genre. Any length. So long as it was original.
I was one of the two people in charge of writing them.

We worked nights to have everything ready for the morning recording.

I still remember the night I decided to quit.

name: Step by Little Step
description:
Bring your cat back to the world of the living.
The rules are simple, as they are familiar:
Do not look back.
and everything will be just the way it was before.

name: Mugen Rinne no Irregular
description:
A new story from the point of view of "Usami Sumireko".
In this original story, she joins the inhabitants of Gensoukyou to fight against the evil spirit "Mima" that has suddenly appeared!
Experience an unknown adventure you've never seen before!

name: Top Shot
description: A Sci-fi Arcade shooter, fly around the screen space and shoot down enemies, gather minerals and exchange them for skills and ships

name: Peter's Journey
description: Embark on a journey of this text anime quest with RPG elements! Walk through beautiful locations, overcome challenges and make Peter’s dreams come true. Every step you take matters. And don’t forget to take the diary - you’ll need it!

name: Parasol Stars: The Story of Bubble Bobble III
description: A retro arcade game featuring the bubble dragons Bub and Bob in human form. Swing parasols to stun enemies, collect fruits and play solo or co-op with a friend.

name: Hamster Playground: Vehicle Pull Game Mode
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Hamster Playground: Doll House DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Hamster Playground: Beware The Cat Game Mode
description: "Beware The Cat" mode provides a new level of excitement as your hamster sprints when the light is green, but must stop in place when it turns red.

name: Hamster Playground: Conquerors Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hamster Playground: Ancient Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Paranoid
description: Paranoid is Dungeoncrawler/Roguelike with an oldschool pixelartstyle where you need to survive alone in the dark and discover new items and pills that help you through this dangerous World. Can you find a way out and wake up?

name: River God: Enshrouded Current
description: Embark on a journey with "River God: Enshrouded Current," where an ancient village battles a curse woven into its very fabric. Uncover the secrets of a malevolent priest whose dark rituals connect the village to a realm beyond life.

name: Pixel Hunt
description: Use unique cursors to find and fix simulated defective pixels on your desktop in this relaxing hidden object game. Enjoy multiple singleplayer modes and online multiplayer with friends, exploring others' desktops or inviting them to yours. Become a pixel hunter!

name: Pokémon Frienda
description: Sin descripción

name: Alaskan Road Truckers: Highway Edition
description: Live the thrill of a new kind of driving simulator and risk it all in the challenge to become an Alaskan trucking legend. Balance the risk vs reward of taking perilous routes to save time, perform roadside repairs on your rig and brave the dangerous conditions on foot in challenging survival-based gameplay.

name: Chamber Survival
description: From a first person perspective, escape this terrifying room.

name: Infinity Blaster
description: In Infinity Blaster you blast through space, defeat challenging enemies and upgrade your weapons! Compete on the global leaderboard, survive an infinite loop of increasingly difficult foes, and unlock 98achievements. Can you prove yourself as the ultimate space adventurer?

name: Prune & Milo
description: Join Prune & Milo, a sister-brother duo, in this enchanting turn-based puzzle game.

name: Hexpire
description: Hexpire is a relaxing city builder where you build a prosperous empire by careful building placement.

name: Hitm3
description: Help your love Dei make his own movie. HITM3 is a third person, slice of life adventure where you control Nam on his days in Santiago de Chile.

name: SuperSpec Rallycross
description: SuperSpec Rallycross delivers a captivating retro-style top-down arcade racing experience. Immerse yourself in authentic rallycross action, enhanced by vibrant anime-inspired visuals and playful physics-based handling, ensuring every race is a thrilling adventure.

name: Illusion Carnival
description: A lost soul wanders through a pop-up book-like whimsical and eerie amusement park; experience fun levels, meet unique characters, escape spirit erosion, and uncover the secrets of the park… The charming yet dark Illusion Carnival begins.

name: The Tomb of Corruption
description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons and slash hordes of monsters in THE TOMB OF CORRUPTION! - A 3D action RPG with rogue-lite elements. Fully customize your melee and ranged weapon with hundreds of upgrades, unlock skills, upgrade your armor and get ready to enter the voxel dungeon!

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown Deluxe Edition
description: Releasing on the Nintendo Switch in July 2024, Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown Deluxe Edition comes with the base game and a selection of DLCs bundled for free: the Season Pass, the F-104C -Avril-, F-4E Phantom II + 3 Skins, and 8 Popular Squadron Emblems.

name: Hookah Haze
description: It's the year 2xxx. The inexperienced Toru Sumiki lands a job managing Hookah Haze, a new hookah lounge on the outskirts of Akihabara, where he meets three eccentric girls. The story unfolds as the girls gradually open up to him, connecting through their fondness for hookah...

name: FishTDX
description: Buy towers to defend your islands against waves of fish! Unlock new towers after each round with new play styles and new synergies. Build your defenses to annihilate the fish with hours and hours of incredibly satisfying and addictive gameplay!

name: Songs of Steel: Hispania
description: Relive the conflict between the mighty Roman Republic and the brave Celtiberian people of Numantia! Featuring hand-drawn illustrations, classic turn-based strategy mechanics, and combat tactics, with decision-making and side missions.

name: Tuzaq
description: Tuzaq is a non-linear visual novel in the genre of adventure.A sweet story about a cruel girl. Or... is it a cruel story that has disfigured a sweet girl?

name: Daydreamy
description: Explore the imaginary worlds of Nela in Daydreamy, the indie first-person narrative adventure that takes you back to those years when everything was possible. Discover how she lost her imagination and let yours soar. Are you ready to embark on a unique adventure?

name: Princess Maker 2 Regeneration
description:
Princess Maker 2 Regeneration, an enhanced port of Princess Maker 2 Refine, will release on Switch, PS5, PS4, and PC on December 2023.

It will have English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language support.

name: Burning Skies Arcade
description: You are the last hope for humanity against the evil General Bloodmester and his army of war machines. With fast-paced action and challenging levels, this free-to-play retro-style shoot 'em up game will take you back to the days of quarter-eating arcade machines.

name: Autopanic Zero
description: Autopanic Zero is a minimalist twinstick shooter survival game. A quick 10 minute fun.

name: Zero Division
description: A roguelite deckbuilder crossed with a CCG, set in a dark cyberpunk world. Assemble a crew of three operators, each with their own unique deck. Augment their abilities, explore a shattered city, and guide them in combat against powerful bosses.

name: Horticular
description: You have been magically summoned by mysterious gnomes to restore a long-lost garden. Attract adorable animals, build a lush environment, and immerse yourself in this relaxing garden-builder. Will you manage to reclaim the wasteland or succumb to a looming corruption?

name: Enelia: Dawn of Madness
description:
Immerse yourself in the enigmatic world of Nauris, where enchanting landscapes hide terrifying secrets: the strange behavior of elders, sinister rituals of priests, and the disappearance of citizens.

Madness lurks everywhere – will you master it or become its victim?

The choice is yours.

name: Hamster Playground
description: Prepare for cuteness overload, relentless training, and fierce rivalry as you and your hamsters take on challenges while traversing the maze and riding a skateboard! Be the first ones to cross the finish line to earn rewards and yummy treats!

name: MonCon
description: Plunge headlong into MonCon, a surreal convention teeming with social monsters, where your conversation skills must be sharpened in order to survive.

name: Anger Foot
description: Anger Foot is a lightning-fast action FPS where the only things harder than your ass-kicking feet are the ass-kicking beats.

name: WeJam
description: With WeJam you can make music with strangers in real-time. It's so easy to use, that anybody can create beautiful grooves within a minute.

name: Probably Art
description: A weird atmospheric art game.

name: Click to Twelve
description: In this game all you do is click until the center number becomes twelve, play this incredibly engaging experience for about 20 seconds then immediately forget about it’s existence

name: Eruptle
description: Eruptle is a daily guessing game where, given a prompted category, players have a limited number of guesses to determine all 10 items listed in the category.

name: The 7th Guest
description: Sin descripción

name: Get To The Top
description:
A challenging game about climbing various terrain areas using a pair of wire hooks.

You have to climb to the top using hooks.
Use the keyboard to move, and the mouse to control your hands and hooks (or gamepad if you are not in enough pain).
Only the most persistent will make it to the top.

name: Rods: Rod Roll
description: Keep rolling! Gift drops every hour!

name: Dog
description: Dog is a clicker game, in which you click on Doge! In Dog, click on the Doge to get even more dog! Get a dog every two hours for a limited time!

name: Lemon
description: Welcome to Lemon, the clicker game more addictive than cat videos! Click your way to Lemon glory, gathering Lemons faster than you can say "Lemon counter." Unlock mysterious inventory drops with golden Lemons, magic Lemons. Dive in and may the Lemons be ever in your favor!

name: Coconut
description: Welcome to Coconut! ✨ Dive into the ultimate coconut-clicking frenzy where the fun never stops. Ready to get your click on?

name: Filthy Rich
description: Filthy Rich is the first and thus far only book of the Filthy Rich series.

name: Idle Champions: Detective Deekin Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Deekin (if you don't already own them) Detective Deekin Skin An Epic Feat for Deekin 7 Gold Deekin Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Infiltrator Nahara Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nahara (if you don't already own them) Infiltrator Nahara Skin An Epic Feat for Nahara 7 Gold Nahara Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Sqube Escape
description: A unique action-platformer game set in the Sqube universe. Challenge yourself through 60 levels filled with obstacles and bosses. Choose from four difficulty levels and enjoy immersive graphics and sound.

name: Tamagotchi Connection
description: The Tamagotchi Connection is a virtual pet released by Bandai Namco Toys & Collectables on July 10, 2024. It is a relaunch of the Tamagotchi Connection line made to celebrate its 20th anniversary. It was first teased on April 25, 2024, before officially being revealed on May 13, 2024. The device contains a hybrid of features from both the Tamagotchi Connection Version 3 and the Keitai Kaitsuu Tamagotchi Plus.

name: Wrong Bullet
description: Wrong Bullet is a captivating chill shooter that unveils an ever-changing world with random weapons scattered everywhere, accompanying your bloody campaign against enemy heads. Collect golden shards from them to unlock characters, discovering even more facets of gameplay.

name: Motorbike Simulator MX Driving
description: Hit the gas in Motorbike Simulator MX Driving! Equipped with realistic 3D graphics and adrenaline-filled jumps, this game takes you to the top of motorcycle riding. Test your driving skills now!

name: Thou Shalt Not Kill
description: "Thou Shalt Not Kill" is a VHS-style first-person walking simulator horror game. You play as Angel, a girl traveling through the forest who finds a VHS tape lying on the ground. She starts watching it, only to discover that the footage is unsettling and tells a mysterious story. As you watch the entire tape, you realize this is no ordinary VHS footage, and you are shocked by its revelations.

name: Touhou: New World + Story DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou: New World - Gensokyo Dreaming
description: Adds Sumireko Usami, Koishi Komeiji, and a whole host of familiar Touhou faces for a total of 8 playable characters in a whole new adventure!

name: Bunker Wars
description:
Bunker Wars: WW1 Strategy is a real-time strategy war game with multiplayer! Gather an army, participate in epic PVP battles, devise your own tactics for victory, and become the best in tower defense!

In the midst of a world war, defend your base from enemies and break through their defenses. Upgrade your bunkers and expand your territories by sending an army to capture strangers. Install towers and distribute troops to different targets.
Strategize in every battle, bypass trenches, upgrade your base, and capture all enemy structures to win this epic RTS game!

name: Verdoria's Kingdom Quest: Magic, Battles & Sorcery
description: Discover this exciting visual novel where brave heroes unravel ancient mysteries and spells. An epic journey you won't want to miss!

name: No Brakez
description: Sin descripción

name: Ferral Quest
description:
Open world. With different biomes: forest, jungle, desert, wasteland snowy, volcanic. In addition to dozens of dungeons to explore and hidden secrets.
Open world PVE missions, special dungeons.
Raid Bosses and Wanderers to hunt scattered around the world.
Progression from Tier 0 to Tier 10.
Develop your skill tree to make your character unique.
Different buffs and equipment so you can forge your strategy in battle.
Get the best equipment by destroying big bosses in their dungeons.

name: Capy Spa
description: In this game, you play as the manager of a newly purchased onsen for Capybaras. As a Capybara yourself, it's up to you to bring joy and happiness to your adorable customers and gain financial success!

name: Type To Report
description: This is an I'm on observation duty fangame where you need type the location of where the anomaly is to fix anomalies.

name: Alessia's Dollhouse
description: Alessia's Dollhouse is a first-person psychological horror game that will take your breath away. In the dead of night, on a deserted road, you take on the role of Darren, an ordinary pizza delivery guy, in a creepy dollhouse filled with sinister secrets. But this time, your delivery address will drag you into an unimaginable vortex of horror.

name: Cats and Mice
description: Online PvP and Battle Royal Experience with Cats and Mice characters.

name: Retro Battle
description: Test your skill on retro games with Retro Battle ! NPC Battles • Defy a variety of NPCs, each with unique abilities and strategies, to unlock new challenges and rewards.

name: Nintendo Switch Sports: Basketball
description: Use motion controls to sink as many baskets as you can within the time limit in the solo Three-Point Challenge. If you’re looking for friendly competition, then up to four players can compete in Five-Streak Battle or Three-Point Contest, and you can dribble, pass and score in two-on-two matches.

name: The Boys Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Breaking Bricks
description: Brick game space themed.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Switchblade Tournament Pack
description: AEW: Fight Forever Switchblade Tournament Pack features wrestling royalty Jay White, five premium music tracks and a brand new tournament mode. Jay White's signature taunts and finisher are part of 12 new moves introduced in Switchblade.

name: Burkina Faso: Radical Insurgency
description: BF:RI Is a Hardcore Tactical Shooter depicting the ongoing Burkina Faso Insurgency. You are CIA Special Operations Group tasked with hunting down ISIS insurgents

name: Monster Lover: Balasque
description: "Summon a Vengeance Demon," they said. "What could go wrong?" they said. Our main character is in over his head! Fortunately, the demon Balasque has taken a liking to him. Wait...is that actually fortunate? A NSFW Visual Novel Dating Sim with a Truly Monstrous Monster!

name: Spiritoké
description: A roguelite turn-based rpg. Gather mystical treasures to power up your party and engage in battle with monsters that become stronger with every step within a dungeon! Each character has unique abilities to dominate the battlefield, growing in strength as the journey continues!

name: Flee the Backrooms
description: This game is a multiplayer & team-based horror themed survival game. Your task as the hazmat team is to complete a backup of all computers and survive in the backrooms. Get ready to witness the events taking area in the first command center inside the backrooms from your own eyes.

name: Litha and the Sunhouse
description: Litha and the Sunhouse is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler with a flashy, fast-paced combat system. You will explore the complex lair of the mighty Sun Usurper while defeating monsters, collecting treasures, avoiding traps, discovering secrets, and helping unlucky fellows you meet along the way!

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Uno: Party! Mania
description: Dive into the classic game with a twist, as extra action cards and special rules have been added to spice things up!

name: Adrenaline Injection
description: Adrenaline Injection is the Demo version of Adrenaline Rampage game - Survivor platformer. You are trapped in a distorted space city. You need to survive and return home. Standing in your way are hordes of techno-mutants. And something strange is going on in this space city.

name: Dog
description: Click on dog. Give him a hat. Get him a toy. Such happy.

name: Monuments
description: Three monumental maps (big, bigger, biggest), at least one secret map and a cosy grove to hang out in after completing the final map. The maps are﻿ combat-heavy ﻿and cont﻿ain elements of slaughter,﻿ ﻿﻿but the en﻿emy counts are n﻿o﻿t out of this world and t﻿h﻿e combat is varied in style and intensity.

name: Last Epoch: Harbingers of Ruin
description:
The Harbingers of Ruin update comes to Last Epoch.

Join us as the fight for Eterra continues with the launch of Cycle 1.1 - Harbingers of Ruin.

name: Pitfall Protocol
description: Navigate an underground warehouse, approve special items, and eliminate anomalies over a tense 7-day contract or face termination.

name: Power Grid
description: Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

name: Funky Panic Attack
description: Can Luna navigate this funky world to find Halloween? - Talk to strange and compelling characters! Freeze obstacles and activate the fast Chili Pepper Mode, but beware - it also makes you uncontrollably jumpy!

name: Little Green Frog
description: Just a game about a little green frog.

name: Neon Flight
description: Speed through space, narrowly dodging obstacles in this high-speed endless runner. Compete for the top spot on the leaderboard and collect ship customizations.

name: Fuseless
description: An electrifyingly fast-paced action-puzzler. Divert electricity through wires to charge batteries. Chase the best times by pushing each wire as close to breaking point without causing an overload!

name: Ark of Charon
description: A merge of colony sim and tower defense, build upon the back of a colossal beast and journey to deliver the World Tree sapling to its nursery. Gather resources, craft, and construct during stops and fight back against the monsters who attack during your journey.

name: Oasis Mission
description: Assemble your fleet of levitating ships and construct bases, merging them into an ecosystem and creating production chains. Modify the equipment of buildings and ships, and unlock new technologies. A well-thought-out economic system responds to every action you take!

name: Mr Mosco Bizarre Climbing
description: Help Mr. Mosco in conquering a mountain of surreal and colorful environments, aided by his sidekick ChikiChaka solving intricate platform sections. Navigate vibrant and bizarre levels in this climbing adventure!

name: Power Solenoid
description: Meet Rockhound, multidimensional traveler living inside Grand Palace, a place filled with strange creatures called Goblins! Discover their personalities and requests!

name: Calmed by the Dark: Shin Neon
description:
Calmed by the Dark Shin Neon is an action RPG set in a future where creatures, known as Biomorphics, live between humans. Being a danger to mankind, an organization of hunters was created to terminate them...

In this action-packed game, you'll take on the role of Tommy, a hunter tasked with protecting the city and stopping the Biomorphic threat. With a mission-based structure, you'll embark on thrilling missions to uncover the truth behind the Biomorphics.

name: Once Human
description: Once Human is a multiplayer open-world survival game set in a strange, post-apocalyptic future. Unite with friends to fight monstrous enemies, uncover secret plots, compete for resources, and build your own territory. Once, you were merely human. Now, you have the power to remake the world.

name: Ladies and Gentlemen, It's the Turnabout Show!
description:
In a strange world being televised to others as a sitcom, defense attorney Jack Jackson must defend a strange client from a strange murder
accusation. But can he get through it with his sanity intact?

name: MadBreak
description: Dive into MadBreak, a captivating reimagining of the beloved "Brick Breaker" game. With each level, you'll face exhilarating challenges that push your skills to the limit. Can you master the unique twists and turns that MadBreak throws your way? Break through the ordinary and embrace the extraordinary. Test your reflexes, strategize your moves, and discover if you have what it takes to conquer MadBreak! Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled journey where every block shattered brings you closer to victory. Are you up for the challenge? Game SUPPORTs controller use!

name: Banana Cat
description: Banana Cat is a simple clicker in which you click a “catnana” (a fusion from a cat and a banana). If you wait a specific amount of hours you’ll obtain cat bananas, some cat bananas will also be drawn by YOU in our discord server. What are you waiting for? Come and click banana cats with us!

name: Pizzeria
description: Click to eat delicious pizzas, buy powerful upgrades, and become the ultimate pizza master. Seek out exclusive drops to make your collection unique. Can you get them all? Start clicking now and rise to pizza greatness!

name: Watermelon
description: Watermelon is a clicker Game, in which you click a watermelon!

name: Honey Peach Clicker
description: Honey Peach Clicker is a Clicker game, which you can keep click the honey peach to Relieves stress. And also, Honey Peach Coin (HPC) will drop after a period of time while the game runing. HPC can be used to exchange special items to Enrich your community inventory collection!

name: Ruin 2: Mimic Adventures
description:
Taking place after the "Elevator Ending" of Ruin, Ruin 2: Mimic Adventures follows the journey of the Mimic trying to escape the Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex!

Swim, bite and attack in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your head and one controller: look where you want to go, pull the trigger to swim, squeeze the grip button to bite. You won't believe how fluid and dynamic the shark motion is.
Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins.
Escape from other sharks, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Use powerups, hide in caves and shipwrecks, and use cannonballs and mines to evade and chase sharks down.

Thousands like you have tried and failed to undo humanity’s mistakes. Will your story be different?

Something very bad happened on Apollo 17, and we recorded it.

description: Immerse yourself in WhereHurt, a psycho-horror game where reality and nightmare collide. Navigate your home, city, and workplace, racing against time to escape inner demons and societal mental barriers. Can you solve the puzzles and confront your fears, or will you be lost forever?

name: Digital Dreams
description: Digital Dreams is a acid fueled trip into the digital realm, an assault on your senses, and a dive into an alternate reality. A set of 8 maps, mostly around the micro-slaugter/lock in fight framework, but not shy of Tyson designs or platforming only maps.

name: Spoonman: Ballad of a Bonehead
description:
It's a typical Wednesday. Your asshole of a boss wants you to go grab a crowbar so you can open the generator room before the hotel you work at goes up in flames. So you head down to the hardware store, but they're sold out. Then you step in some broken glass and cut your foot. Then a homeless dude tries to sell you a crappy robot suit. And THEN a necromancer mistakes you for one of her minions and you're stuck in her creepy witch's hut!

Yep, it's just a typical, crappy day on Pen Island...

name: Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Ninja Emaki
description:
"NINJA EMAKI" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1986.
Take control of the young hero Shinbei and fight to rescue the princess from the evil spirit army.
Pick up scrolls to gain access to 8 different kinds of Ninja Magic. Use them wisely, and they'll be the key to advancing through the game!

name: Chapatriste
description: Chapatriste is an intense FPS that immerses you in an infernal world based on the Spanish Tercios of Flandes. Face hordes of skeleton soldiers in a dark and terrifying environment where survival depends as much on your aim as on your melee combat skills. Fight!

developers.name: Campus Cámara de Sevilla - Centro FP Superior

name: Poly Plaza
description: An open world game where you need to invest to become the richest man in town.

name: Where Birds
description: Search for 100 birds. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Mini Golf League: Sports Simulator
description: Test yourself in an exciting mini golf simulator and take the champion's cup in Golf Championship!

name: Uphill Stunt Driver: Extreme Racing Simulator
description: Xtreme racing on dangerous hill tracks in powerful cars - overcome this difficult climb and become the king of the mountain!

name: Art of Glide II
description: Embark on a cozy, endless adventure across the mesmerizing desert landscape in Art of Glide 2. Glide gracefully through the sands, uncovering hidden landmarks as you go.

name: Bouncy Chicken
description: It’s time for some fun on the farm in whimsical action puzzler Bouncy Chicken! Master single-screen challenges in top-down 3D style as you take aim at fire your feathered projectile around the chicken pen to gather cobs of corn. In each of the 90 unique levels of Bouncy Chicken, you’ll have only a few shots available to shoot a chicken in any direction, ricocheting off the fence, brick walls and springy obstacles or even through warp points. The objective is to collect every cob of corn on screen before your shot chances run out.

name: Air Hockey: Casual Table Arcade
description: A classic arcade sports board game where you can challenge both your friends and test your skills against the AI!

name: Amber Alert
description: Step into the shoes of a policeman in "Amber Alert," a survival horror game. Responding to a late-night call, you find a sinister cult of women abductors. Your mission: rescue a captive girl. Navigate perilous streets, evade cult members, and survive.

name: RoboKiden
description: RoboKiden is an innovative team-based action game where five players collaborate to control a single mecha in strategic battles. Integrating Web3 technology and blockchain, the game uses the $KIDEN token for in-game transactions and NFT trading. Players can earn and trade $KIDEN, enhancing gameplay with digital ownership and economic opportunities. Developed by The Breach Studios and powered by Elixir Games, RoboKiden offers a unique gaming experience with vibrant characters and dynamic battles.

name: Dragon Saikyou Ouzukan: Battle Colosseum
description: Sin descripción

name: Alerta Roja
description: Space-themed action and skill game.

name: Non Stop Driver
description: If you slow down you die, if you speed up you live!

name: 666: El día del portal
description: Action-platformer game with dual scrolling and multidirectional shooting.

name: Co|incidence
description: "co|incidence" is a FVN produced for Renpy.

name: Taboo Trial
description: 3D Rogue-like action game. You are a Valkyrie, choosing blessings from the Nordic gods to build your unique combat style. Go to complete the Taboo Trial guided by Loki.

name: JumpOut
description: You are a bloog, a type of non-existent animal from the future, who has to survive the deadly lava that spread throughout the world due to a crack under the earth, and your goal is to kill the person who caused it, that of course he put some lasers on you trying to kill you. That crack can only be closed with metal so you must collect as much as possible to close it while you play with your life in jumps that could kill you at any moment.

name: Beyond the Portal: Island's Salvation
description: After an accident, we find ourselves stranded on a mysterious and perilous island. Dive into a captivating turn-based role-playing game featuring a diverse cast of monstergirls. Is it possible to escape from this enigmatic place?

name: Black & White Lite
description: "Black & White•plot exclusive version" is a dystopian visual novel game: black and white, sensibility and reason, freedom and order: follow your beliefs and join your camp.

name: Alchemy Unbound
description: A drag and drop crafting game that offers unbound possibilities. No limits, no direction, just pure creativity and endless crafting.

name: Flikk
description: A fast-paced precision platformer where your aim is to reach the goal by toggling objects on and off.

name: The Dawning Clocks of Time: Remake
description: A story of love, war and betrayal on an intergalatic scale. A epic third person shooter with both sandbox and linear story progression. Take up arms and battle for the ages, who will decide the fate for all of humanity? Now remade in HD / 4K with cinematic presentation.

name: Memory Puzzle Adventure
description: Test your visual memory with this casual puzzle game.

name: Only Drive
description: You are a professional racer.This time you will race against time for your dog's life.If you go slow, you and your dog will die.

name: Domenation
description: Survive the Pulse in Domenation's futuristic post-apocalyptic Bubble Royale. In this round-based multiplayer shooter, scavenge for gear and outlast rivals to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Council of Mages: The Party Game
description: Gather up to 6 friends, and compete to join the Council! Customize your mage and team up or challenge each other in easy-to-learn mini-games that will have you all laughing and cheering together. Not enough controllers? Connect your phone and play! Create memories in this whimsical party game!

name: Machi Koro With Everyone
description: "Machi Koro With Everyone" is the definitive edition of the “Machikoro” series developed as a digital and online version by Grounding, the developer of “Machikoro”! ! Let's enjoy "Machikoro" with everyone online!

name: Ashes of Arcanum
description: This is a simple engine created based on the TTRPG Ashes of Arcanum.

name: Blow Away Survivors
description: "Blow Away Survivors" is a thrilling casual roguelite action game where you unleash attacks, sending countless enemies flying. Face massive enemy hordes and powerful bosses, level up and grow stronger. Enjoy diverse skills and actions powered by a physics engine, all in short, exciting sessions.

name: Blow Away
description: Blow Away is a casual action game with unique elements of "manual attack," "knockdown" and "blow away "in addition to the Rogue-lite elements. You can also defeat enemies, develop characters, and learn powerful auto-activated skills. Use them to defeat the enemy's large army and powerful boss.

name: The Heights
description: The heights is a story based first-person single-player action platformer. Shoot and climb to the top of the skyscraper whilst avoiding assured death. Solve puzzles to proceed to the next floor. Get Access to the CEO's hard-drive in the office on the top floor to sell it to the highest bidder.

name: Super Pixel Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie War: New World
description: "Zombie World War: New World" is a shooter where players and three AI teammates battle a massive zombie invasion. They must cooperate using skills and strategies to survive and defeat mutants. Intense combat with high-quality graphics and PBR materials providing a visually stunning experience.

name: Chaos Groove
description: CHAOS GROOVE! Classic fast-paced, over-the-top fighting action, featured with upgraded HD 2D Sprites, online play (RollBack Netcode), ground-breaking effects, and a dynamic system that earns points for unlockable goodies. Fight like a hero, play like a legend!

name: Dead Air
description: An Indie Psychological Horror Rhythm Game. Featuring songs based off popular internet horror icons.

name: The Final Act
description: The Final Act is a mix of visual novel and puzzle game where you assist writer Rebecca Carter in overcoming her writer's block by crafting the perfect murder plot for her novel. Solve intricate puzzles, adjust crime scenes, and navigate immersive storytelling to uncover the perfect crime.

name: Sir Quest and the Temple of Apollo
description: 3D action adventure where a treasure hunter medieval knight will delve into a greek mysterious temple in search of the flying artifact which, according to mythology, Daedalus used to escape from the Labyrinth of Minotaur.
